original_title: 優しすぎて何でも許しちゃうおっとり天然人妻の無自覚な誘惑。　美乃すずめ
overview: I am not blessed with a job and have never dated a woman. My only healing without such a good thing is Mr. Suzume, a neighbor's married woman. A married woman who is a little natural and unconsciously shows off her chest chiller and panty line and makes me blush. One day, he hears Suzume's scream and tries to go to her rescue, but he can't stand the way he looks and crosses the line.
title: The unconscious temptation of a gentle natural married woman who is too kind and forgives anything. Suzume Mino
